Equipment Actions.Action 1: Longsword, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 13 Slashing
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Tail, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 10ft, Average Damage: 15 Bludgeoning, Can Grapple Medium or smaller creatures

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Marilith makes 7 attacks, six with its Longswords and one with its Tail
Other Actions.Action 2: Teleport, The Marilith magically teleports to a space it can see
Other Actions.Action 3: Parry, The Marilith increases its AC against a Melee Weapon Attack it can see, Reaction

Abilities.Ability 1: Magic Resistance, The Marilith has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects
Abilities.Ability 2: Magic Weapons, The Marilith's weapon attacks are magical
Abilities.Ability 3: Reactive, The Marilith can take one reaction on every turn in combat

Damage Resistances.Damage 4: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks
